content: Italian officials acknowledge they do expect the drastic order to spark some civil unrest, but they believe a sense of patriotism — as well as fear of the deadly virus — will persuade most Italians to observe the restrictions on their movements.
translations: ita:Le autorità italiane riconoscono di aspettarsi che questo drastico ordine possa scatenare disordini civili, ma ritengono
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
